Scene:
Chozaemon's Suicide
(Chōzaemon seppuku / 長左衛門切腹)

Play: The Tycoon's Exploit (絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

Production: May 1987



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Sumitayū VII (see also Takemoto Mojitayū IX) (竹本住大夫 (七))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Enza V (鶴澤燕三 (五))
